### Tender Notice: Security Guard Services
#### Request for Proposal - Solicitation Number: M5000-23-05483/D
---

Date of Publication: 2024-04-17
Closing Date: 2024-05-13T16:00:00
---

#### Tender Opportunity
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for Security Guard Services at the RCMP Headquarters in Iqaluit, Nunavut.

#### Tender Description
The RCMP requires a contract tenure of ten months with an irrevocable option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods. This solicitation is subject to the Nunavut Land Claims Agreement. Security clearance is a mandatory requirement.

The procurement method is competitive, and the tender will be evaluated based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit, Inuit Benefits Plan (IBP), and Price.

#### Selection Criteria
 Bidders must submit proposals to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per the instructions provided in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

#### Notice
It is the responsibility of the bidder to regularly consult the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for the most up-to-date information.

#### Indigenous Procurement
The Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for government and private sector companies to identify Indigenous business capacity. Having a business profile in the IBD can increase the company's visibility and provide additional business opportunities.

#### Instructions and Documents
Interested bidders should download the tender documents from the Canada-Buys website. The bid response instructions are located in the RFP document.

**Important Details**
- **Procurement Category:** SRV
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
- **Trade Agreements:** World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity:** World
- **Region of Delivery:** Iqaluit
- **Contracting Entity Name:** Royal Canadian Mounted Police
